alert.note: Alert for Barrow; Clarke; DeKalb; Gwinnett; Jackson; Madison; North Fulton; Oconee; Rockdale; South Fulton; Walton (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 30 at 12:29AM EST by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Rockdale, northwestern Oconee, southeastern Barrow, central DeKalb, southeastern Gwinnett, Clarke, northern Walton, eastern Jackson, central Fulton and Madison Counties through 100 AM EST... At 1229 AM EST, a line of strong thunderstorms was along a line extending from Commerce to near Bethlehem to near Cascade Heights, and moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Atlanta, Decatur, Monroe, Jefferson, Commerce, Watkinsville, Danielsville, Athens, East Point, Snellville, Loganville, Clarkston, Stone Mountain, Avondale Estates, Statham, Lithonia, Arcade, Nicholson, Walnut Grove and Comer. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 500 AM EST for much of north central and northeastern Georgia.

area.areaDesc: Barrow; Clarke; DeKalb; Gwinnett; Jackson; Madison; North Fulton; Oconee; Rockdale; South Fulton; Walton
